messages.name: domain.pmopenprovider.bank
messages.msg: fTLD token required for registration and data in owner handle must be exactly the same as in token. You need to request token from registry

messages.name: domain.pmopenprovider.barcelona
messages.msg: Local trademark ID required for Local Trademark phase
Intended use value should contain information on how the domain name will be used

messages.name: domain.pmopenprovider.cat
messages.msg: IntendedUse value must contain information on how the domain name will be used

messages.name: domain.pmopenprovider.hu
messages.msg: Passport number. Required in case if domain requester is a private individual
Vat number. Required in case if domain requester is a legal entity

Intended use value should contain information on how the domain name will be used

messages.name: domain.pmopenprovider.no
messages.msg: Company registration number. Required in case if domain requester is a legal entity

messages.name: domain.pmopenprovider.radio
messages.msg: Intended Use value should contain information on how the domain name will be used

messages.name: domain.pmopenprovider.ro
messages.msg: Company registration number. Required in case if domain requester is a legal entity

messages.name: domain.pmopenprovider.sg
messages.msg: If the admin contact is a natural person located in Singapore, the corresponding Singapore Personal Access ID has to be given. The format of the SingPassID is: X1234567X - where X is an upper case letter at the beginning and end of a seven digit string In case of a foreign organization, it is possible to use the SGNICID: SGNICID-X12-345678 - the SGNICID will look like this example

For companies located in Singapore, the corresponding company registration number has to be given. For Singapore citizens and permanent residents, please provide NRIC or Passport No. For Singapore companies, please provide RCBID as it appears in RCB Certificate. For Singapore societies, please provide RCBID as it appears in ROS Certificate.

messages.name: domain.pmopenprovider.sport
messages.msg: Intended use value should contain information on how the domain name will be used

The format of the SingPassID is: X1234567X - where X is an upper case letter at the beginning and end of a seven digit string In case of a foreign organization, it is possible to use the SGNICID: SGNICID-X12-345678 - the SGNICID will look like this example

For companies located in Singapore, the corresponding company registration number has to be given. For Singapore citizens and permanent residents, please provide NRIC or Passport No. For Singapore companies, please provide RCBID as it appears in RCB Certificate. For Singapore societies, please provide RCBID as it appears in ROS Certificate.
